content:
Decentralized oracles for verifying conditions:
- [ ] Is {text} on YT video description
- [ ] Is {text} on Twitter post
- [ ] Is {text} on GitHub gist
- [ ] {user} is verified at Civic/uPort

Can do claims from that, such as Netvision video ownership transfer. Works with contract`s autonomous transactions.
#Tasks
title: ERC: P2P oracle processing
